meaningMnemonic: I'm going to <kanji>expose</kanji> my <kanji>bone</kanji>s for a second here and be <vocabulary>blunt</vocabulary> with you... this makes sense, because if you're exposing your bones at someone, you're not hiding anything. You're being frank and blunt.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
